title: The Legendary Siblings
description: An unofficial English translation of Gu Long's Juedai Shuangjiao - Also called Handsome Siblings (title of a recent TV series now on U.S. Netflix), Peerless Duo and other variations of bros, twins etc.Twins are born from an illicit affair, then separated at birth to be raised as enemies to fulfill the vengeance of the two women scorned. The plan hits an unexpected snag as our main protagonist, while still an infant, falls into the clutches of the Martial World's (Wu-Lin?) worst and most feared villains (in self-exile). Their plan is to raise a demon and unleash him unto the martial realm as their own final revenge on that world. Things don't go quite as expected and chaos and hilarity ensues...
author: Gu Long
